paper_abstract: In this paper, we prove L-p-convergence for p > 1 of the particle filter for a class of unbounded functions. Furthermore, it can be shown that the approximation solution converges in probability to the true optimal estimate for the case 1 < p <= 2 and the approximation solution converges almost surely to the true optimal estimate for the case p > 2. In addition, some numerical experiments are presented to illustrate the main convergence results.
paper_title: L-p (p > 1) Convergence results for Particle Filtering
